proceeds.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the money that is obtained from doing something or selling something
proceeds.translation[0].definitions[0].e: We sold the business and bought a villa in Spain with the proceeds.
The proceeds of the concert will go to charity.
proceeds.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the money gained from selling something
proceeds.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Allied-Signal was planning to use the proceeds from the sale of Union Texas to reduce debt.
proceeds.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the money that a business gets from ISSUING (=selling) bonds, shares etc
proceeds.translation[1].definitions[1].e: San Diego will use the proceeds from the bond issue to acquire and install new police facilities.
